Description: Path (relative or absolute) to the input data
Path (relative or absolute) to the directory where the output should be saved
Start date in the format YYYY-mm-dd HH:MM:SS - if the data start after start date, simulation will wait for the data to start
End date in the format YYYY-mm-dd HH:MM:SS - if the data end earlier, simulation will stop there
Number of time steps per hour
Additional open space PV power in kWp
Additional open space wind power in kWp
ID of the scenario which defines the expansion

Config Parameter Name: expansion PV min kWp for section usage
Description: Minimal size of a PV installation on a roof section, to include this section

Config Parameter Name: expansion PV max inst kWp per section
Description: Maximal size of a PV installation in kW per roof section

Config Parameter Name: expansion PV max inst kWp per unit
Description: Maximal size of the total PV installation in kW per control unit

Config Parameter Name: expansion PV kWp per roof area in m2
Description: kWp per roof area (how it is in the three dimensional space)

Required: only if ‘expansion PV kWp static mode’ is set to true
Description: see next variable
If set to true, ignore all roof information and just add a static pv installation per roof

Config Parameter Name: expansion PV max total kWp addition
Description: Maximal size of all added PV installations over all control units
Power in kW of the simulatively added batteries
Capacity in kWh of the simulatively added batteries
Initial SOC of the simulatively added batteries

Required: only if ‘expansion BS power computation mode’ == ‘Use E:P ratio’
Description: E:P-ratio for setting the power of simulatively added batteries dependent of the capacity (interesting for parameter variations)
If set to ‘Use E:P ratio’ the variabel ‘expansion BS P in kW’ will be ignored, instead P will be E / this variable
Efficiency of the battery for charging in percent
Efficiency of the battery for discharging in percent
Self-discharging rate in percent per time step

Config Parameter Name: net present value time horizon in years

Description: Controls how the profiles (if there are more than one) should be assigned to a new created component

Config Parameter Name: CU selection mode for comp. add.
Possible Values: as in data / random / best SSR / best NPV
Description: Controls how to select the control units for expansion, in case of best SSR and best NPV a simulation is executed first, where all SSR and NPV values for every control unit are computed, then they are sorted and finally this sorted list is taken

Config Parameter Name: use BS for creating SSR list for SAC planning
Description: Should a battery be added for creating the sorted list for the SAC planning?
